title: Bad News Boar
itunes:title: Bad News Boar
description:
A big ol' bunch of games have appeared, and we chat about all of them, including Neon White, TMNT: Shredder's Revenge, Mario Strikers: Battle League, and The Quarry. Plus, our thoughts on Starfield, the RE4 remake, Diablo 4, Pentiment, Forza, and a ton of other stuff from the Microsoft and Capcom showcases. Video games! They're back!

Advertise on The Nextlander Podcast at Gumball.fm, or support us on Patreon!

CHAPTERS

id spoilers. Thanks for listening.
